slides.text: This is a project about the shared DNA in music. Orchestral music for a play in 1875 can become electronic music for a cartoon in 1983.
Which can be transformed by a minor rap group…
…and then influence the breakout hit of a rap giant….
We can see the full impact of sampling if we look at how sound is passed down and forms a musical lineage.
Hit Em Up has more lineages...
